lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I was born into a solid middle class family that gave me the opportunity to go to good schools and on to college. I also had the support of a special family. With all that, I want to give some back and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Cash Management Dept. of a large corporation. I do a lot of bank reconciliations and help the field with their deposit issues. There are (7) of us in our dept.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Without people like me, you have no TV to watch.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can. And Kiva is an ingenious way of helping those in need around the world from your own backyard.

lender.name: Tyson
lender.loan_because: I simply enjoy helping.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior at Utah State University. I will graduate December 2010 with a bachelors in Psychology. I then intend to pursue another degree in nursing. From there I hope to do humanitarian health care and education for a career.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and given my family the awesome privilege of reaching out to others. I have spent time in Kenya, Sudan, and Uganda. By giving a little we can help to improve a families quality of life in a tremendous way.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in ministry to others both in the U.S. and in Africa. I have worked extensively with refugees and have traveled to Africa numerous times.

lender.name: Scott McHugh
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who can make a difference in their community
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are entrepreneurs and we feel being part of our community and helping others is an important part of life. Giving back makes us feel good.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because:
It's awesome to think that I can make a world of difference. Good things happen to good people.
"How wonderful it is that nobody needs to wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." Frank, Anne (1929-1945)
lender.occupational_info:
By day I work for an electrical construction company. I manage people, provide cost estimates and purchase materials. The types of projects we build are factories, stores, restaurants and office spaces.
At night I sing orginal punk rock music. Check out my band's Myspace page link below and prepare to be entertained.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to support less fortunate entrepreneurs. I was a single welfare mom at one time, so I know how tough it can be to get ahead. I want to give back, make a difference and create good karma.
lender.occupational_info: I am dedicated to my career and sell homes for a living on the West Coast of British Columbia. I really enjoy my work and have been selling real estate since 1987. I am launching my own real estate company and hope to do well so I can contribute more to this worthy cause.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I want to help out where I can. I love the way Kiva loans allow you to actually see the recipients and the progress made towards their goals. It's a very personal and individual process.
lender.occupational_info: I run a smallish talent management company in Southern California. We rep local actors for both film and television. I love what I do and I wildly encourage entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: After seeing on PBS the smiles, happiness, expectations of these small-business owners, I wanted to be a part of this marvelous process.

lender.name: Greg & Joy
lender.loan_because: I believe this program will make a huge difference in the world. Lot's of people helping a little bit.

lender.name: Anju
lender.loan_because: Helping another reach their goal - Helps me reach my gaols as well.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Call Center that does work for Non-Profit Orgs.

lender.name: Sarai
lender.loan_because: WE are a couple deep rooted in giving back to this world. This is only one of many charitable contributions we give back to communities around the world.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I believe I have a responsiblity to share my blessings with others.

lender.name: RKH Group of Fairborn
lender.loan_because: I believe in the saying "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for life". To me Winning is Giving to Others so they can win.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: It is amazing how little I can give, and the huge impact that small amount can change the lives and future for an entire family!
lender.occupational_info: I help put low income and elderly in affordable housing.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: "Freely you have received, freely give"
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate HIV care and HIV/STI prevention research in Kenya.

lender.name: Foley Family
lender.loan_because: we hope it helps

lender.name: Bob & Joan
lender.loan_because: We want to provide an honest opportunity for others to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: Pharmacist; Nurse

lender.name: serge
lender.loan_because: He who has a bountiful eye shall be blessed.... proverb 22;9 This is wonderful.. God bless L'homme dont le regard est bienveillant sera b√©ni,
lender.occupational_info: Operator in a manufacturing company...

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: Never doubt that a small, group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has. Margaret Mead
lender.occupational_info: I am engaged in teaching and learning activities at an urban community college in Vancouver, BC.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I have the support that many do not.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying soil science and plant biology.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: We all have a duty to share with and help those who have much less.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: Environmental Analyst and Professional Life Coach
lender.loan_because: it's rewarding to know you are helping people build a better life.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I refuse to sit back and do nothing!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a financial investment firm and research firm.

lender.name: Dawn & Brian
lender.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves. God has been so good to us and we want to share our abundance with others. Faith without works is dead - we all need to put our faith into action.
lender.occupational_info: (Brian) Excavation - Earth/dirt moving with big excavator machines and also builds bridges for Whatcom County, Wash. (Dawn) Works for Childcare Worldwide as the choir assistant for the Ugandan Orphans Chior who sing & perform all over the United States to promote sponsorship for children in 3rd world countries.

lender.name: Milo
lender.loan_because: mom & i believe a small token provides hard working people with the means to make possibilities happen. we are both fortunate & want to share our money to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: i started with little money, but a dream & goal to build a career that would provide me with what i need. i am a successful hairdresser now, many years since that dream started & am thankful for all those who believed in me. although it wasn't always easy, my motivation carried me through, and with that, i am now financially comfortable enough to help others to achieve their goals.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I spent some time traveling in other countries, and have seen how a little from me, can go a long way. This is a great opportunity to help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in college.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.occupational_info: I help schools and teachers integrate the arts into their curricula, and teach kids through theater.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I like how these loans allow people to take risks and take the initiative to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 5th graders (10 and 11-year-olds) in a public elementary school.

lender.name: Kelvin
lender.loan_because: I just hope to make someone's life a better one.
lender.occupational_info: I am a distributor of consumer electronics and lifestyle products.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I work with my hands repairing computers and other telecommunications equipment.

lender.name: kirk & Sheri
lender.loan_because: Were much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: Kirk; I manage the sales for a traffic saftey company. Sheri; I supervise reading teachers in my local school district.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Mike and Ania
lender.loan_because: Because we want to and can. This is a brilliant idea that needs everyone's support.
lender.occupational_info: We are both creative people who love to travel.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: We have a responsibility to help those who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I make web sites.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: I'm trying to make better solar cells.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It seems like a great way to do a small thing and make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I train seniors to use computers as well as upgrade and repair computers with my husband.

lender.name: Delbert
lender.loan_because: It gives me great joy to see another person succeed. Lending is my way of extending a hand of friendship and goodwill to persons living around the world. It is my hope that all people will live in peace and harmony. It is sad when those in my country as well as other countries seek to destroy rather than build for the future. Perhaps in a small way I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I was an administrator of a program that assisted physically and mentally disabled adults succeed in gainful employment.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: Studied finance and environmental studies at the University of Oregon. Now working for Legacy Health System in their financial planning department.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is a Christian thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a men's prison. I teach G.E.D.

lender.name: Cameron Hill
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference...
lender.occupational_info: web design, sustainability, life

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed in doing what they love to do. Sometimes a little extra help can mean everything.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist working mostly with charcoal, but developing sculpting skills as well.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has the capability to sustain themselves given they have the resources. I am so lucky in my life and I love to share what I have with others.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I want to help as many people as I possibly can. My God is a God of abundance and has given SO much to me. I offer my prayers for all! :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a manager in a fast paced company. Some day I will start my own business.

lender.name: Kelso
lender.loan_because: giving a donation is good, but giving a loan to help people make a better living for themselves is even better.

lender.name: Brown Realty Group
lender.loan_because: I believe local businessowners/entrepreneurs are in the best position to empower their community financially and spiritually if they understand that they are only stewards of the money resulting from their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: We help home sellers market and sell their homes and investment property as well as help prospective buyers purchase homes and investment property.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know that I'm helping other people to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy creative projects and am fulfilled by work with a purpose other than simply making a profit.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: everyone is interconnected and interdependent; by helping others, everyone benefits.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Baker

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: To make a difference.

lender.name: Summer
lender.loan_because: Everyone entrepreneur should have the opportunity to start their own business and to live their dream. If I can give help to another in reaching this goal I am happy. =)
lender.occupational_info: As a professional organizer I help others to declutter their lives and spend more time doing what they love. I also own and run a promotion company where I help individuals and businesses advertise their services, upcoming event, job opening, etc.

lender.name: Bill & Jean
lender.loan_because: We think this is a fantastic way to help small business men and women to grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Bill conducts studies that look at ways to better organize and deliver health care. He also studies how common certain diseases are and what factors appear to cause them. Jean is a former health educator and is now retired.

lender.name: Maddie
lender.loan_because: I love EVERYBODY!!

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive change in the world, one person or group at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I sell goods in a super large store in the United States.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.occupational_info: I work with chronically mentally ill people.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, it's the way to change the world. Changes can happen on a small level and that's exciting to me.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: The world is abundant. It is my hope that the folks I lend to will pass on the gift.

lender.name: Rochele and Tom
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do and I have been so blessed.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have lived in Mexico and Egypt and respect hard work everywhere. I am honored to support people with vision and passion.
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrator in a private ESL school. Our students study English before entering colleges in the United States.

lender.name: Vinh
lender.loan_because: "All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them." "Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken winged bird that cannot fly."

lender.name: Eloise
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be in a position to do so and that by giving what you can can have such an impact on these peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I find people new jobs

lender.name: Nile
lender.loan_because: I want my girls to learn to give & see the small difference each of us can make in this world
lender.occupational_info: I run a multiple restaurants for large corporations and I also have my own business of restaurant management & consulting firm

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance presents a revolutionary opportunity to eliminate poverty one family at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a think tank: we provide a forum for dialogue about foreign policy choices.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: Currently donating on behalf of a relative who recently passed away.

lender.name: cameron
lender.loan_because: Because It feels good to help other people who need so little of what WE have to make a big difference in their lives.Its easy.
lender.occupational_info: Professional/tradesman

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and my family
lender.occupational_info: Take care of my family and home

lender.name: Jassy
lender.loan_because: It is somewhat helping me to empower others to make a difference in their lives for a better existence.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: I feel that I should give back to the fish community. They have done so much for me.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am in 7th grade. I love math, science, and music. I want to be a marine biologists when I finish school.

lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: I believe people helping people heals the world.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I like being able to have a positive effect, halfway around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software. I might have had something to do with the software in your mobile phone.

lender.name: Kamyar and Parastoo
lender.loan_because: We wanted to show our daughter that we all can make an impact on a global level, even with minimal contributions. We are paying forward our good fortunes.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.occupation: Nurse - Newborn and Infant Critical Care
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I help to care for the teeny, vulnerable, ill little ones.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to become independent & self-supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I visit new mothers in their homes to teach them how to breastfeed & care for their premature babies. I also see TB patients to stop the spread of TB. The people who live with a TB patient are tested & given medication if needed.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy to help people in need. And not just help them temporarily, but so that they can provide for themselves in the future and help to grow their country's economy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a sophomore in college. I plan to study geography and international studies for the rest of my life and travel as much as possible.

lender.name: Joe & Lieu Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I believe a hand up, can help the individual, their family, and their community. I don't have a lot of money but, with a Micro loan, a little gos a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I design packaging {Foam Wood Corrugated} to protect things like computers, monitors, industrial equipment, small electronics. I also figure out how to manufacture our products.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Customer Service for an insurance company dealing mostly with elderly, retired, and disabled.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I believe all of the lenders in Kiva do so because it feeds our soul. Our combined efforts help to create a better world, one small step at a time.

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because: Since retiring in 2003, I felt it was time to give back. I have be fortunate in my life, no major sickness and a good job for 31 years. I volunteer for Habitat For Humanity twice a week, which makes me feel wonderful inside. Now I would like to spread my help past the local area.
lender.occupational_info: I build custom motorcycles and custom trikes. This style of machine are based on the American V-Twin motor. I do this to keep busy in retirement.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to invest in human capital.

lender.name: Darcy
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Gus
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky for what I have, and I want to share it with people less fornunate than me.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of micro finance, helping hard working people prosper who otherwise would not have the opportunity to do so.

lender.name: STEVE & WENDY
lender.loan_because: THIS PROGRAM IS A WONDERFUL WAY TO HELP PEOPLE WHO CAN REALLY USE THE HELP!!!!

lender.name: Anne & Ryan Fisher
lender.loan_because: We believe it's our duty to help those people trying to help them selves.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of an individual, one-on-one aid program with adequate oversight for audit, progress and check and balance purposes. This Kiva system is a down to earth, common sense program. It's one good way to "love your neighbor."
lender.occupational_info: I seek the truth and try to do good through my freelance writing.

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: My mum came as an immigrant from a third world country and has been in the U.S. ever since. Someone gave her a chance for a better life, so I would like to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: Right now, recovering from major surgery. I still bake & cook, a great deal for friends/family. I hope one day to be able to help another person out there, who so truly needs it.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship can change lives for the better

lender.name: Jerral
lender.loan_because:
Early in my life I had mentors who believed in me and helped me to succeed. Long ago I committed to return the favor. So, as soon as I was successful in some of my small businesses, I wanted to see if I couldn't also help young people and mid-life career changers to be successful, too. I have been able to do exactly that, several times over.
.
lender.occupational_info:
As a handwriting analyst, I learn about people (and help them learn about themselves) from their handwriting. I match people in relationships or business, and help solve mysteries, frauds and difficulties where things are handwritten. I wrote a book to help others learn these skills: THE HAND BEHIND THE WORD.
As a hospice caregiver, I help people dying of AIDS or Cancer or other degenerative diseases to be more comfortable in their final days. I wrote a book to help others learn these skills: URGENT WHISPERS: Care of the Dying.
I also help businesses protect customers' financial and personal information, in order to comply with laws, regulations and good business practice.
.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Others are not as lucky as I have been. I want to provide economic self-sufficiency to others in the world.
lender.occupational_info: A college setting - providing support to students and staff using computers and the internet.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: I believe that capitalism can be a driving force towards solving many of the world's problems.
lender.occupational_info: I help customers who are experiencing issues when purchasing music or videos from the online iTunes Store. I am also an artist that works on large-scale structural sculpture.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because:
The Guest is inside you, and also inside me; you know the sprout is hidden inside the seed. We are all struggling; none of us has gone far. Let your arrogance go, and look around inside.
The blue sky opens out farther and farther, the daily sense of failure goes away, the damage I have done to myself fades, a million suns come forward with light, when I sit firmly in that world.
I hear bells ringing that no one has shaken; inside"love" there is more joy than we know of; rain pours down, although the sky is clear of clouds; there are whole rivers of light. The universe is shot through in all parts by a single sort of love. How hard it is to feel that joy in all our four bodies!
Those who hope to be reasonable about it fail. The arrogance of reason has separated us from that love. With the word "reason" you already feel miles away.
How lucky Kabir is, that surrounded by all this joy he sings inside his own little boat. His poems amount to one soul meeting another. These songs are about forgetting dying and loss. They rise above both coming in and going out. kabir

lender.name: Truman
lender.loan_because: I travel around the world, building infrastructure, and I care about helping people create economic stability in their lives.

lender.name: Michael Yanikoski
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is only right that everyone should get the opportunity to prosper and make something better out of what they started with.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a desk in Boston, talking to clients all day.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world by enabling people to help themselves. I have been fortunate enough to be the recipient of helpful people and would like to pay it forward. This is such a brilliant and worthy idea by the Flannerys and I am so excited to be part of this.
lender.occupational_info: I seek and find marketing professionals for businesses in a variety of industries.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone has a right to happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a marketer. I help people make their businesses and products reach more customers.

lender.name: Bo Bo
lender.loan_because: I have a soft spot in my heart for defenseless women who need to be protected. I, also, like fish and especially enjoy angling & riding motorcycles with my dad. I know she will love her new wheels! I think Mrs. Chea Mom and I could be "best friends!"
lender.occupational_info: It is my job to make sure the whole household remains safe, secure and well exercised.

lender.name: Dara
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to have dreams and want to fulfill them. There have been times in my life I wish that someone would have believed in me and loaned me money to make it a reality!
lender.occupational_info: Giving to help others isn't work.. it is a passion!

lender.name: timothy
lender.loan_because: To give an added edge towards somone's success through efficient and beneficial means.
lender.occupational_info: Operational and financial managment of a disaster reponse organization.

lender.name: Eldon&Delphine
lender.loan_because: Our son and his family gave us $75.00 Kiva gift certificate for Christmas.

lender.name: Mata2
lender.loan_because: God blessed my family and me with good health, great family, extraordinary friends, love and the means to help others.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: From one small business to another we all can use a helping hand now and again.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I help where I can.

lender.name: George & Toom
lender.loan_because: there was every reason to, and no excuse not to
lender.occupational_info: George is retired from a life in local radio and television. Toom worked and studied hard in mid-life to become a superb nurse. She also continues to import Thai jewelry for a U.S. wholesaler.

lender.name: Derrell
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to travel extensively and I understand the impact that these loans have on real people.
lender.occupational_info: I designed software for computer operating systems and the Internet.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I loan because it helps me to feel more connected with the rest of the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I work as a welder and pipefitter in Construction. I install piping systems in all types of building. A pipe fitter is diferent that a plumber in that we install primaraly process piping. A plumber installs sanitary piping and potable water system.
We intall piping in HVAC systems for heating and cooling, and process piping in such industries and paper mills, Steel Mills, and the like. We also do hospitals , comercial buildings and the like.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I own an accounting firm and a music school

lender.name: Patricia
lender.occupational_info: I use email and the web to provide information to internal and external customers on company policy and procedures.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: This seems like a great way to get money directly to people who are working to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a public school system most of the year. During the summer I run a sport fishing guide service.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I believe in teaching a person to fish, not to hand them food. I'm excited that this gives people the opportunity to earn money and be self-sufficient rather than just taking it. It's a great idea to help those who want to be proud and achieve something despite having limited means.
lender.occupational_info: I work with celebrities who have been on television and help them earn a living.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: I perform remote testing on various types of telephony circuit.

lender.name: Jay & Lisa
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves. This is a hand up not a hand out. We would like the recipients of these loans to do good things for other people to allow them to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Helping agencies, developers and owners construct their building projects.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I really like the interpersonal element of this site. It's far more interesting and inspiring than donating to a faceless organization
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying and trying to find my place in the wide world of international politics.

lender.name: earnest
lender.loan_because: because as an atheist and a socialist its the right thing to do and the best I can do until we have a world wide socialist revolution !
lender.occupational_info: My work? I work in the medical field and I am a specialist in geriatrics but I consider my public civic work just as important. I am also very involved with music.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Nelson
lender.loan_because: There are so many people in the world that could use the money that I might waste - on something that could save their lives and families.
lender.occupational_info: I send emails to previous buyers of a website so that they will buy again

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: I think it is good to let people sucssed
lender.occupational_info: Computers

lender.name: Chantel
lender.occupation: Registered Nurse, Red Cross Volunteer, Student

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves and give as others have given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I provide advice to the U.S. government on how to solve problems in the areas of science and technology. I am also an elected member of a local school board.

lender.name: M Louise
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of helping another person improve their life. I'm attracted to micro loans because of the direct involvement with individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I've been a entrepreneur (small businesses) and teacher. And even now in my later life, feel strongly that it is important to give/share/encourage individuls to keep up their zeal and desire to grow and "keep t;rying" to improve through taking a "leap". That leap and act of faith is the vision that life offers.

lender.name: Marcel
lender.loan_because: it's fun to do
lender.occupational_info: I implement software to improve business processes

lender.name: logAmah
lender.loan_because: because I know what living in a T W country is like.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Atheist.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I would like to see others prosper, if there is some way I could help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an internet radio station.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: there isn't a good reason not to.
lender.occupational_info: I study psychology. I do laboratory experiments that examine why people think and behave the way they do.

lender.name: Michael & Nee
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone be successful in her business.
lender.occupational_info: In my work I help people adjust to traumatic life experiences.

lender.name: Jack & Lisa
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help and ... it's working!!!
lender.occupational_info: I paint portraits and landscapes and I love to play golf. I also am working on a few inventions that I hope will help other artists and maybe even other golfers some day.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: it gives me that warm feeling inside.
lender.occupational_info: I write web-based applications and games with experience in high volume traffic and data.

lender.name: Justin
lender.occupation: MBA candidate at Presidio Graduate School, SF

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a great life & a great job. I would like to give others the chance to achieve ongoing success & Independence by funding businesses. I believe this gives them ownership of there own lives , a sense of pride & accomplishment that is so much more motivating than a simple hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I manage all things regarding technology at an entertainment advertising agency. We do DVD packaging, movie posters, advertisements, etc.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of people,. To take their future in their own hands and change their future

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: The money does more good for others than sitting in my bank account doing nothing... its the logical choice :)
lender.occupational_info: I help back up the internet so everytime you search, what you're looking for is there.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference.

lender.name: Jan&Nelly Hoonings
lender.loan_because: Wij waren geroerd door dit intiatief en willen graag meedoen, om heel direct mensen verder te helpen.

lender.name: Hank
lender.loan_because: This was a Christmas gift. I was given $50 to loan to anyone on Kiva. I'm excited about this and LOVE the idea of being able to re-loan the money after it is paid back.
lender.occupational_info: I make web pages.

lender.name: Ane and Alberto
lender.loan_because: We want to support projects wich empower women to independency and substainable living.

lender.name: Svein og Solfrid
lender.loan_because: There are people who need help to help their selves

lender.name: Jessica
lender.occupational_info: I work freelance, writing for magazines and websites in Japan and abroad.

lender.name: Nell and Barry
lender.loan_because: We loan because this type of support provides a tangible way to assist those trying to improve their quality of life. Kiva provides us with the opportunity to personally impact the lives of families all over the word.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher who helps adults earn their high school diplomas. My husband is a research scientist.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: We should help whenever possible.
lender.occupational_info: For the past 31 years I've work in a factory that makes parts for airplanes. I currently work as an inspector.

lender.name: Min.JAMES
lender.loan_because: To show the love of JESUS! At work in my life.

lender.name: Dorman
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: I sit behind a computer, all day, and place lines and text that explanes how to Build Plants.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I feel that I really makes a difference for the people that need it
lender.occupational_info: creating software for healthcare

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I can, and I believe in microeconomics as a way of conquering poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I loan books to middle school children (ages 11 to 14).

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: It makes a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people skills to help them perform their jobs, and help them plan their careers.

lender.name: Herbert & Cynthia Frank
lender.loan_because: We believe that we have been lucky to have been born here in the United States and to have had the opportunities that we have had.
lender.occupational_info: Herb was a Vice president of an insurance Company and Cynthia sold products to organizations who wanted to raise money.

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up and help to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I give freely of my time to help out organizations and committees at school, church, and in the community.

lender.name: Uffe Laugesen
lender.loan_because: I would like to share my wealth with others and I think this way is an easy way.
lender.occupational_info: Secretary

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries. I want other folks to have the opportunity to run their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I design & build trails for hikers, mountain bikers and other trail users. My passion is digging in the dirt, my reason is to help protect our Mother Earth. Trails can improve health & offer non-consumptive, sustainable economic development for developing nations.

lender.name: billie
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping themselves which the borrowers do by paying back. I think uplifting women is the key to a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach women and men to become registered nurses and I work as a nurse in a small hospital.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help set up computer systems that enable doctors, nurses, and pharmacists to provide better care to their patients.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It's one of the best ways I've found to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Primarily, I write, edit, design and layout magazines, brochures, newsletters, advertisements, textbooks

lender.name: Ed & Gigi
lender.occupational_info: business owner

lender.name: Sonja & Hans
lender.loan_because: we want to support and encourage fellowcitizens in other countries
lender.occupational_info: we worked both on education and research

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: we all have a moral obligation to make the world a better place for all its inhabitants.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to lend money to individuals who want to purchase commercial buildings in the United States

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because:
I have always wondered how to change the world for the better.
I immigrated to the United States from a third world country. And I know, the US dollar goes a long way in the 3rd world. My perception of the other side of the world is a little bit more comprehensive than most, since I grew up there.
There is nothing extraordinary about me. I am not a former president , a hollywood celebrity, or a CEO of a big company, but I am a US citizen and a harworking one at that. I realize, that as an indivual, I wield within my hands an economic power that can change the world bit by bit, the US dollar, since I do not have the IQ of Albert Eistein nor the prestige of famous people. My dollar will speak for me. I am proud to be one of the lenders.
Peace through self-sufficiency.
And thank you to the KIVA TEAM and to all the KIVA LENDERS!!
May FORTUNE follow in every footsteps you take!!
Keep on lending!!
lender.occupational_info: Retail

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: Loaning gives me an excellent means of really helping someone. It is better for the borrowers themselves to repay and it keeps the money working.
lender.occupational_info: I took early retirment from my business to become the pastor of a struggling congregation.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: If all the people who were financially able to help, would help, even a little bit, this world could be so much better for all of us. This website is a GREAT start.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I started my own business without any funding and understand the difficulty that can be for an entrepreneur. I believe we need to have faith in other entrepreneurs to break the cycle of poverty because they are such valuable social roll models in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I design all sorts of buildings and industrial equipment along the US east coast

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It's fun to help people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a school that has a huge Latino population. I work mainly with the children in the classroom. I also help families with anything from filling out school forms to finding resources available to them in our community.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: every little bit makes a difference to someone in the world
lender.occupational_info: I help develop computer systems

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: People willing to work for their dreams deserve a helping hand from friends.
lender.occupational_info: My business is sculpting and painting animals - dogs, frogs, iguanas and other creatures. For pleasure, I write stories.

lender.name: Alli Inouye
lender.loan_because: I work in such a frivolous industry.
lender.occupational_info: I make things look beautiful so you will want to buy stuff. Especially when you don't need it.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: While I may not be able to change the world, even one person can impact it positively.
lender.occupational_info: Corporate blogging software sales

lender.name: Mark S
lender.loan_because: It started as a gift from a friend to help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: working for the betterment of public school educators.

lender.name: James & David
lender.loan_because: it's at the core of humanity and it's proven successful for humans of over eons of time.
lender.occupational_info: James does computer support at a bank, and David does business.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: "Always do right. This will gratify some people and astonish the rest." Mark Twain

lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: i'm thankful for the privileges i have
lender.occupational_info: helping companies to use the social web effectively.

lender.name: Manon et Jean-Ren√©
lender.loan_because: It feels so good for the lender to participate and hopefully for the entrepreneur too. The cooperation in the adventure of entrepreneurship is so important !
lender.occupational_info: I work for Desjardins (financial coop) to insure that our goals (community d√©veloppement, √©ducation/information and financial services for the members ) are respected. All that, by collaborating in different projects with 19 other financial coop (caisses populaires Desjardins) regrouping more than 212,529 members in our region.

lender.name: Susana
lender.loan_because: I can. All life is equal. I have all that I need. Others should have what they need. Where there is hunger, there is no freedom/democracy. I believe in freedom. Democracy is something we do; it's not something we have.
lender.occupational_info: I taught first grade for 10 years. Now I teach English as a second language

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I have a special interest in the people in Africa because my oldest daughter lived there two yrs. during her stay for the peace corp. I can only wish more people around the world could give of their finicial resourceses in helping these pepole that want more
lender.occupational_info: Here in the USA I was a computer salesman & before that I was a turkey farmer. So as you see I have had work on both sides of the fence & I understand the value of what it takes to become an owner & worker.The neat part about Kiva is you can add money to your account anytime you wish & you would be helping someone you lend that money to. For the price you pay for coffee for 1 week can pay for someones new business out there. Just think of the lives you can reach through Kiva.

lender.name: Cat Master
lender.loan_because: I like the statement made "Teach a man to fish...."

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: i believe it passing it around
lender.occupational_info: i visit ill people, mostly elderly, in their homes and try to make a difference for the better in their lives

lender.name: Aaron & Lauren
lender.occupational_info:
Aaron works for a marketing firm.
Lauren works at a hospital.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I like seeing where my money is working. This is an investment in the good nature of people, not large organizations.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly write for the Dayton Daily News and have a weekly column in one of their Neighbors sections.

lender.name: By & Lin
lender.loan_because: We can

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It's fun to watch people succeed and grow.
lender.occupational_info: Currently retired

lender.name: Robert and Liza
lender.loan_because: A little bit goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: We both work on web-enabled database application programming, but would rather be traveling, cycling, and bird-watching.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: ...everyone needs a break.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: This is a win/win situation. This one time loan can be lent over and over again!
lender.occupational_info: Accounts receivable for a property management company.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to help change lives around the world
lender.occupational_info: Teaching children to learn, question, and support the world around them.

lender.name: Olenka
lender.loan_because: There are many people who work as hard as they can and still are struggling, and I feel that those who can should help people in need as much as they can.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I program changes, modifications and enhancements for clients of a software package.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art to children.

lender.name: Harold Dana Sims, Ph.D.
lender.loan_because: I support the micro-credit movement, especially in Spanish America where I spent a great deal of time researching the region's history. Small business people deserve affordable credit and our admiration for their valiant efforts to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now but my working career was spent teaching and writing about Latin American history at the University of Pittsburgh.

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: I loan because I CAN !!! I started my own business when I was 24 and I want to help others start or expand their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business owner with my sister. I operate a breast milk bank. We collect breast milk from mothers and make it available to sick babies.

lender.name: Elliot
lender.loan_because: I want to make this world a better place for humanity!
lender.occupational_info: I manufactufacture and distribute stone products to fabricators, builders, developers and interior designers across North America.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: "I do the best that I can, in the place that I am, and try to be kind." paraphrasing Scott Nearing
lender.occupational_info: Mandala Artist and Intuitive Counselor *************** 3 question readings available worldwide through e-mail. *************** MandalaMaker‚Ñ¢ software developed by my husband is easy and satisfying to use.

lender.name: larry
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people reach their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses in analyzing the books of records

lender.name: Tresca
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to do this for me.

lender.name: Scott Regan
lender.loan_because: Paying it forward is a powerful philosophy.
lender.occupational_info: Blending inspiration with motivation to achieve extraordinary results

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like the perpetual nature of the loans, seeing our money actually help someone is great.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me so I want to do my part to help make someone else's life better.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I know my funds are going directly to the people who need it, and I get to see the impact of the money I give. I also love that these people are empowering themselves to create a business that will help themselves and those around them,
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer in Dallas, TX. I mostly do wedding photography, but I also shoot sports and portraits.

lender.name: breck
lender.loan_because: I like seeing small business thrive without the normal ‚Äòred tape‚Äô that usually strangles it.
lender.occupational_info: I design systems for 'homeland security' projects.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: In the end, it's not about what you've accumulated, it's about what you've shared.
lender.occupational_info: I serve God and God's people in the Episcopal Diocese of Chicago.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for my grand kids, and I believe the more people that are self employed and understand capitalism, the more peaceful and prosperous the world will be.
lender.occupational_info: I grow palm trees for landscape use.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: it would be cruel not to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student and a part-time teacher.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I was given the opportunity
lender.occupational_info: Easy compared to how hard people work across the world to earn a living.

lender.name: Dangerous Old Woman
lender.loan_because: To balance in even such a tiny way the inequities that abound in the world. By U.S. standards I am only one level above 'poor'--but compared to much of the world's population I am wealthy. I hate knowing that so many millions struggle to barely exist and it excites me to help provide opportunities for people who are so willing to work hard if given the chance. It takes so little!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself...and enable them to improve their situations so they can enjoy life a little more easily.
lender.occupational_info: I help produce conferences for large companies.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and feel connected to the world.

lender.name: Jeanine
lender.loan_because: There is no better way to help someone than to give them the opportunity to help themselves. It means a better society for all. "Teach a man to fish; and he will eat for a lifetime."

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can help hard-working entrepreneurs get the capital the need to finance their worthy projects. They can grow their business and impact on their community. Everybody wins!
lender.occupational_info: I analyze business needs and design computer software that meets those needs.

lender.name: Dow Family
lender.loan_because: To share our good fortune.

lender.name: Dane
lender.loan_because: There Is A Need
lender.occupational_info: Creative

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I now KNOW I can make a difference in someone's life...

lender.name: donny
lender.occupation: I own a small construction company

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I serve food and drinks to people.

lender.name: Greg & Barbara
lender.loan_because: I think it helps people get going.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's like planting seeds in a barren field - to see later what has grown there is of great satisfaction. And as our world economy evolves we must all nurture the millions of fields around us.
lender.occupational_info: My work in the United States is the same as the work through Kiva - except we are much more demanding and conservative requiring all borrowers to have collateral and cash flow and can not lend money on a guess and by golly - but with Kiva we can.

lender.name: Kyra
lender.loan_because: This was a Christmas gift to me. I didn't know about Kiva before this. What a great way to pass it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work with our future--children.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I study diseases in order to control and prevent them.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed! I want to make an impact in some way (big or small) that will truly help better lives and change the world. And... human beings should care for and help one another! *Imagine all the people Sharing all the world... *Imagine all the people Living life in peace... PEACE & LOVE ~ Sarah

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a commercial photographer and have been fortunate to run my own business for 26 years. My subjects are diverse and include business executives, families, professional boxing, food and people in all walks of life. It is the life stories of my subjects that make my job so great. Now, I am happy to hear the stories of my Kiva partners.

lender.name: Goss/Phylow Family
lender.loan_because: We are very blessed to have all that we need. We wanted to help others support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to loan me.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Hotel

lender.name: Thomsen Built
lender.loan_because: Empowering people feels amazing.
lender.occupational_info: We're entrepreneurs. We love creating, whether it be a home, a community or a new way of doing something. It's fun to take an idea and bring it to life, that's why we love supporting other entrepreneurs in Kiva.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing how other people's business' work around the world.

lender.name: The Wood Family
lender.loan_because: Microcredit can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info:
Nicki: Food writer and radiographer in Nashville, Tennessee; author of "The London Shopping Companion" and other books.
Tom: Nashville journalist; author of "Karski: How One Man Tried to Stop the Holocaust" and other books.
Eloise: Eighth-grade student at Harpeth Hall School. Someday to be pop star.

lender.name: Cholula
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others around the world.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: In a way it's the gift that keeps on giving.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching young minds

lender.name: Jaxsdamax
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: marke
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I look

lender.name: justin
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: I build machines that make cars

lender.name: Graff
lender.occupational_info: Setting up events for groups. www.KeysActivities.com

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, especially women, have more opportunity for success and independence.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students. I have also written a history book about women finding their strength and independence in the U.S. West.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: it's a privilege to help women who are working hard to help themselves.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: This is one way I am allowed to live out the Love of Jesus Christ my Lord. It is a small thing to us, but may enable another to be lifted out of a hole..... I've been there too.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional instructor pilot and operate a small flight school in Nampa Idaho. I teach people to fly aircraft. When people are fully trained, they come to me to be examined; when they pass the exams, I ussue to them their first Pilot's Certificate for aircraft flight. I am certified and certificated to work on and repair aircraft as well as fly them.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I believe that "paying it forward" is the only way to improve the world. I have been given chances because in America that is what happens. Entrepreneurs in 3rd World Countries need my help.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are self-employed and own a laundromat and rental properties. We have a 17 piece Big Band that works in the Midwest and have performed on several cruise ships.

lender.name: Mareena
lender.loan_because: This is such a wonderful idea; helping others to become self sufficient. I may not be able to change the entire world, but I believe that with every small act of kindness we make a difference in the world for the better.

lender.name: Bernadette & Harry
lender.loan_because: Our start up money was a gift to me...Now I am leanding to some one who can make a difference in their life .... Makes you feel good to help others
lender.occupational_info: We work in business that help and services others

lender.name: Madison
lender.loan_because: There are many crossroads in our lives. Some jump out and make much noise, and some are barely noticeable. Help us remain true to that path, which is our own. Increase our awareness of the choices we make. All things work together for good as we trust in Your presence as our only guide. We let it be according to Your will.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small decorative wall stencil company where I am the creative director for DuVeau Stencils. I am a also a LifeStyle Enhancement Specialist.

lender.name: Del
lender.loan_because: A small helping hand at the right time for the right opportunity can bring amazing results.
lender.occupational_info: Discover and model new business initiatives.

lender.name: Kelly & Alain
lender.loan_because: It Just feels so gosh darn goooood! Try it, it's kinda addictive. I check out other participants portfolio's and some have from dozens to hundreds of loans. Whenever I see this I am a bit envious. I wish I could afford to do more. My husband and I are going to attempt to do a loan w/ every paycheck, twice a month.
lender.occupational_info: I am a substitute teacher, and part-time student. I fill in for permanent teachers when they need to take time-off. My husband is a design engineer that designs hydraulic valves for a large, international, hydraulic company.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: To show the love that is given by believing in JESUS CHRIST as your savior.

lender.name: Pat and Bill
lender.loan_because: We care
lender.occupational_info: We are a retired couple following our dreams into old age. Life has been very good to us and we want to pass it along.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I like helping others, and feel grateful that I can.

lender.name: Leonard
lender.loan_because: II believe in the entrepreneur sprint and I'm willing to help anyone that is willing to help themselves. I'm also set a goal for myself to give loans to every Undeveloped and developing countries in the world. Currently, (44) different nations and counting.
lender.occupational_info: Work for a major brokerage investment company in the tax/cost basis area. I've been in the banking and investment industry for over (20) years.

lender.name: Steve and Susan
lender.loan_because: God's been so good to us and we consider it a great honor to be able to glorify Him by giving to others.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: i can...

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: It's important to help others any way you can, even if the amount you can give is small.

lender.name: Charels
lender.loan_because: I love getting to make a significant contribution to aid a needy family. I also enjoy learning about there culture and how my contribution is helping them.
lender.occupational_info: I design heavy duty foundry production equipment. I take the customer's requirements and design schematics to build there new equipment.

lender.name: June & Dani
lender.loan_because: Because we can!

lender.name: Don& Michelle
lender.loan_because: We all can make a difference

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: because I can. And if you can, why wouldn't you?
lender.occupational_info: I'm trying to make it as an actor. Meanwhile working with computers pays the rent.

lender.name: brandon
lender.occupational_info: I build new materials in the computer.

lender.name: Johnathan
lender.loan_because: I started doing this because everyone needs a helping hand from time to time. My family is blessed at this time to be able to give to others praying for a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers most of the day.

lender.name: Kelly and Sean
lender.loan_because: We believe the world can be a better place

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: i believe in the power of microeconmics. But fundementally, I beleive that we are all interdependant on one another and it is in the best interest of all to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee teams that respond to agency and consumer complaints.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: This will change the developing world.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: Giving to others makes me happy!
